metadata.description: The living dead walk among us! Zombies have taken over the planet! Humans only exist as novelty attractions - or worse! But today is the day of revolution and soon the tide will turn on undead supremacy! Academy Award-nominated writer Kim Krizan (Before Sunrise) presents a zombie epic like no other! Ripped from the pages of the critically acclaimed Zombie Tales anthology, collected in a single volume for the first time!
metadata.name: Zombie Tales 2061, Vol. 4
